Paragraph: Both isomers of propranolol possessed similar depressant potency on isolated atrial muscle taken from guinea - pigs . 5 .

Therefore, the disease entities related to this paragraph are the conditions that propranolol is used to treat, such as heart conditions and high blood pressure.
